name: Adventu-rope
description:
Created for the 2021 ICT Winter Game Jam.

The theme this year was "lost and found" and I took that concept and applied it to a knight exploring an ancient temple. He lays a rope behind him to find his way back from confusing corridors and quickly pull himself out of sticky situations.

Assets provided by https://ansimuz.itch.io/

(https://ansimuz.itch.io/top-down-adventure-assets)

Music provided by OkamiDeluxe

(https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCwvLYm2460XKx__lLzPXK0A)
